website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty tempered glass screen protector that safeguards from both scratches and chips. A solid choice overall with a smooth finish.
pros: Touch-responsive construction doesn't slow down gaming
Coated to minimize smudges and fingerprints
Comes with 2 screen guards and multiple accessories, including wipes, microfiber cloth, hinge stickers, and squeeze card, to make application easier
cons: Despite the application hinges and other accessories, bubble-free installation can be tricky if it's your first time

customer_reviews.title: Saved. My. Switch.
customer_reviews.text: Theres no bottom line this morning was half asleep moving my items around and dropped it from chest height onto slate rock..I was mortified..I picked it up and saw scratches and cracks and lost my darn mind. (I've had the switch since around launch when I got this protector for it. I know its plastic but it still will scratch the hell out of your switch.) I sat down and peeled it away. It was what got scratched and dented etc, the rest of my switch is fine I'm ordering another pack right now and I am going to be more careful in the future..lol
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Lake

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome and great price for 2 high quality glass protectors.
customer_reviews.text: Got mine on release date just in time! Had great packaging and comes with two perfect sized glass screen protectors for your Nintendo Switch. Comes with 2 protectors, bubble remover,cleaning cloth,wet wipes and dry wipes for both screens. Super easy installation with no bubbles. Pro tip - I turned on the shower hot to steam up the room and installed this in the bathroom to avoid dust and it looks great! You don't even notice its on the console. 5 stars, fast shipping and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE! Peels in corners and around edges on a Brand new Switch
customer_reviews.text: Brand new switch, just out of package, Brand new screen protector out of package. Installed as per instructions and it peels and doesn't stick all around the edges. DEFECTIVE. It has been several weeks now with constant pushing it back down in those areas and every morning it has peeled back up again. Very disappointed in this product. Do NOT recommend purchasing these. Look for other manufacturers that have a better product. Sending back if Amazon allows us to.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Install is impossible without bubbles
customer_reviews.text: I’ve installed many screen protectors on phones, iPads and mini game systems, so when I ordered this product I didn’t even give it a second thought as to how diffiuclt/ impossible it would be to install... to be honest I’m gutted that out of 4, yes 4 glass protectors not one didn’t produce bubbles the size of finger prints. I even emailed the company Incase I was doing something technically wrong with the install. Turns out I wasn’t , it’s just crazy impossible to install without bubbles arising and never , never have I come across a screen protector so install unfriendly. Definitely a pass for me...
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT as easy as the instructions make it out to seem. (Buyer Beware)
customer_reviews.text: For $10 you get two screens and a good amount of instruction. I'm a 40 y/o father trying to follow these instructions to a T for my daughters Switch and let me tell you it. is. not. easy. I washed my hands like the instructions said, even wore thin latex gloves and still managed to generate bubbles under the tempered glass. cleaned the Switch's screen before application and all. That was 5 bucks a screen. I'll be looking elsewhere for some protective screens from now on.
customer_reviews.author: JULIO C PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: Glue isn't any good
customer_reviews.text: I took half an hour of my day to perfectly set the screen protector on my new switch- hours later, a mark appeared that distorted light and looked dirty- yet I couldn't clean it off. I had to remove it to find out it was in fact the glue, which did not work and separated from the screen, leaving a skin-like circle around it from the old glue. Luckily, I was able to remove it, but I shouldn't need to.
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Bottom of my Switch scratched like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions and installed the product twice, but my amFilm protector had noticably visible dust trapped underneath each time. Worse, using this product caused my Switch to be damaged and it will probably cost $20 - $50 to repair (e.g. replacement housing or sending into Nintendo). The mere act of putting the Switch on a bathroom counter and rubbing the amFilm Protector cleaning cloths on the front of the Switch left the back side of my Switch horribly scratched. My Scratch now looks seriously diseased, with discolored patches all over, not just a small linear scratch. This product needs instructions telling you to put something soft like a towel, under the Switch.
customer_reviews.author: BillBrasky

customer_reviews.title: Too large for the Switch
customer_reviews.text: After buying two packets because of the lint and such that kept getting under the film upon putting on - we finally got it on right (in a steamy bathroom) only to find that the glass screen protector was too large and so the edges got stuff all under them. Removed and threw away.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Tricky installation but the end result is as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I originally wrote a bad review because there was a giant bubble in the middle of it after a kind of shaky installation process. But the bubble went away! So that's the thing with a product like this. It either goes on easy and perfectly as advertised or it doesnt. At first... it didnt. But the bubble went away on it's own after about 2 weeks. I have no complaints and I feel like leaving a bad review was unfair, so I changed it to reflect my experience. The screen is easy to clean and sturdy. Several weeks of travel, while careful in a case, and so far no damage at all.
customer_reviews.author: Big T

customer_reviews.title: Skip hori, get this.
customer_reviews.text: Had issues with my first attempt with some bubbles remaining and they sent me a replacement and it's still completely bubble free unlike the hori ones where the adhesive melts and bubbles appear after the console heats up. Definitely the best screen protector available for the Switch Update: the switch dock has scratched the protector down the sides, not over the screen but it's still visible and annoying, it doesn't seem as strong as implied. It's pretty terrible that the provided dock scratches the switch and protectors, but this protector despite supposedly being tough glass got numerous micro-scratches from the dock.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one - switch dock will scratch your screen
customer_reviews.text: I worked in the cell industry for five years so I'm picking with electronics and accessories. Too reasons to buy this one 1) comes with application tools (alcohol wipe, dry wipe, microfiber, and positioning tabs. I wish it came with a dust removal sticker but you can use use painters or scotch tape for that - helps pickup those leftover dust bits). 2) they offer warranty on replacements 3) fast shipping 4) good thickness - sometimes cheap protectors use thin glass that doesn't really so anything
customer_reviews.author: NM 2014

customer_reviews.title: 🤔 didn't even last a few hours
customer_reviews.text: I received this 2 pack of screen protectors around 7 PM, put one on (exactly following instructions) and at 10:38 pm it literally just fell off while playing and I the screen wasn't even being touched! Just applied the second one and it doesn't even feel like it applied sturdy enough either, of that makes sense. I registered the product for the warranty immediately before applying the 1st one, thankfully so I just emailed them for replacement. As it stands right now, I'm unhappy with the product, hoping it's a bad batch and that the seller makes it right. I will update on how my experience goes with the replacement and how this 2nd one or the replacements perform.
customer_reviews.author: Krissi Sixx

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is not great. Somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One of the screen protectors was scratched all over, so that’s half the money gone. The scratches could be seen even with the screen on. The second one was good but had two smaller scratches on the top. Less noticeable. It could be easier to install if they included a snap on template. In terms of bubbles, I suggest starting off on one end and slowly lowering the protector while gently applying pressure to ensure no bubbles form. The sticker sheet that was supposed to have the dust remover was completely empty. No stickers on that sheet at all which was quite ridiculous. Over all it’s a decent product, but
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: Held up for two long years of play! Died due to heat.
customer_reviews.text: So, I got these screen protectors way back in May 2018. For two years it remained bubble-free, protected my Switch from scratches, and remained intact. Recently it started running a crack from the bottom up through the top of the protector from the heat of having the Switch docked. I have it docked more than handheld by far. Considering the age, I had expected this sooner. I'm not happy they broke but I'm sure it would've happened at some point. Being that I got mine so long ago, I cant say whether they've changed anything since then, but mine didn't have even one tiny bubble nor any other artifact left behind after application. It was perfect. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: ElysetheEevee

customer_reviews.title: Misleading instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions indicate to remove the first tab in order to apply the screen protector. Doing so, the screen protector is actually backwards in how you should apply it. Thought it was a fluke, returned it and ordered another one. Same problem. Took off the OTHER tab than instructed to apply it. There is also no "dust removal sticker" included. Yet after using the microfiber cloth (I even applied in a steamy bathroom) there was a bunch of dust and tiny fibers. I had a leftover dust removal sticker from another device's screen protector kit so I used that. I do not think I will be repurchasing thia product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and adheres well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to apply to a new Switch, and was pleased at how easy it was to apply to the Switch. You have to make sure to clean the screen of the Switch and clear it of any dust that would cause air bubbles under the glass. But if applied well, the glass will be clear and free of any bubbles. I suspect that, like glass protectors for phones, the glass screen protector will crack more easily than the actual Switch screen. However, that's the point. That the protector cracks and takes the brunt of any impact instead of the screen. It's also why it's nice that this comes in a two-pack, for that inevitable replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Misty321

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Switch
customer_reviews.text: I've had this on my Switch ever since I got it because I was worried about the dock scratching the screen. It's barely noticeable unlike a lot of other screen protectors. I never bothered to write a review of this product until tonight when I dropped my Switch and the screen cracked in about 4 different ways. I panicked at first but after remembering reading another review that said only their screen protector cracked, I immediately peeled it off and my Switch was perfectly fine. I can't believe how well this screen protector worked. I'll definitely be buying another pack if I ever end up breaking the other protector.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This thing is LEGIT! my Switch fell & possibly may have been stepped on after... and while the protector cracked & splintered, the Switch's original screen was A-OK! Plus instructions now include warnings about not using the alcohol wipe and "dust removal" stickers on the Nintendo Switch. If you're buying this to place on a tablet, you're fine. If for the Switch, everything in the box warns you about screen damage, so be sure to find a different soft cleaning cloth for the screen before applying
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Trusted for all my devices
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this brand of screen protector for both my Switch and my Iphone. It’s a Very reliable brand and priced affordable so I can buy multiple, since I go through screen protectors monthly. Now even my Apple Watch has a screen protector. Do yourself a favor and buy two or more at a time. Non of my screens have been naked for more than a few minutes. These guys are also easy to install with the lil wings so your finger don’t accidentally touch the sticky side or aligning it wrong. I’m very particular about perfection and a crooked screen protector really bothers me. Anyways enjoy and keep up the good work guys.
customer_reviews.author: Keys

customer_reviews.title: Dust Strips Damaged my Screen
customer_reviews.text: Step three specifically says to "Use the dust removal sticker to pick any dirt particles still left behind." DO NOT USE THE DUST REMOVAL STICKERS ON THE SCREEN. My screen now has small scratches from the strips. I inspected the strips and they specifically say "Please DON'T use this to remove dust on Nintendo Switch." If those aren't the dust removal strips, what are they? Why aren't the mentioned otherwise in the instruction pamphlet? Where are the actual dust removal strips? No other strips came with the product. Thought I was being careful by following the directions and ended up damaging the screen. What gives? One star, obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Money saver, literally!
customer_reviews.text: Kids each got a Switch for Christmas, and my husband put these on right away. My son took his on a trip and when he got out of the car, the Switch fell face down onto the concrete driveway. We were both too afraid to peel off the Screen Protector, it looked so cracked. But this Screen Protector did it's job, it was a cracked mess, but the screen underneath was perfect. Immediately went online and bought another set to replace the broken, and have a spare. I was so impressed that when my cell phone screen protector cracked, I ordered this same brand to replace it. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Nick&Jake

customer_reviews.title: A necessity if you own a Nintendo Switch!
customer_reviews.text: I've been meaning to get a screen protector for my Switch but I procrastinated long enough for my dog to get some scratches on my screen. Really easy to install. I really thought I'd catch some dust particles on application since my room was extremely dusty. Takes timing and once applied, any particles that were caught, I could just lift that part and wipe it with the dry wipe. Don't forget to apply for the warranty just in case any trouble happens.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles and Difficult to Align
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions but ended up getting debris and hairs no matter how hard I tried because I had to hesitate trying to get it aligned--it does not align perfectly with the Switch screen. I don't care what they say. That was attempt number 1. Number two was better on the debris, but still not aligned to my satisfaction and Bubble City, USA. Their squeeze card was useless. That's a loss of almost 10 bucks. I'll be looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good deal and a great product. Two protectors (in case putting it on the first time doesn't go so well or you have two devices) and all of the accessories to apply both of them. I really like how the stage-2 film has little tabs on the side, which makes places the protector correctly on the screen SO easy. *HINT* - If you run hot water in the bathroom for a minute, the steam will grab any dust in the air and make it sink. Then you can apply the screen without worrying about those pesky dust motes zapping in out of nowhere when you are putting it on. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Werbick

customer_reviews.title: It's all about application.
customer_reviews.text: It's super clear and touch responsive. My only complaint is installing it just like any screen cover. The static cling on the outside wrapper was terrible. It attracted dust just as I was sticking it to the screen and I ruined the 1/2 of the screen covers it came with. Watch out what you place your device on when installing. Don't be near any fabric surfaces. You cannot remove and reapply once it gets dust stuck to it. I tried and it created bubbles around the particles that stuck to it. The 2nd application went better but there is still one dust thing I see that I can't remove but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: paola montes de oca

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Normally I don't write reviews, but I had to for this one. Clearly they pay attention to detail here, as they give you many supplies to be sure you don't need anything for installation. I'm glad it comes with two, as having kids anything can happen and it's good to have a spare. Application is easy, and I had no issues with bubbles. This thing is so clear you can't even tell it's there, and I'm glad it's not flimsy. Again, kids. Will order again if needed, but definitely a positive experience. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Good
customer_reviews.text: The tempered glass itself works well, stays on and is a perfect cut for the Nintendo Switch screen. The problem I had was mainly with the guide tabs attached to the glass to help you lower it precisely where you want it. The peel away top layer is attached too loosely and started to peel away before I had it lined up correctly, causing it to lower onto the screen too early and attach slightly crooked. Went through a couple of these (ordered two packs) before it finally went on correctly - I resorted to using just the edges anyway without the use of the guide tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Flapjack Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Currently I’m on the second set that came in the package. First one got cracked after a handful of drops. It’s been months since the replacement was put on and still looking good. Fits the switches screen nicely and with patience goes on without a hitch. I don’t notice any bubbles or any colors being affected by the screen protector. Everything’s looking normal. Obviously still fits with most/all cases. Unless you get a case that already covers the screen then I’m not sure about that. Overall I’d purchase these again if my current one cracks.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best screen protector and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been through many phone, tablet, and video game screen protectors and I am terrible at installing them. I usually leave bubbles, open flaps, and dust particles. This brand is the BEST! I got my first clean install and it was super easy! No bubbles, no dust particles and this fit perfect on my kids Nintendo switch. The protector itself is of excellent quality and you get a two pack for a super low price! Also a lifetime warranty that is easy to register for. WOW I am sold - going to buy from tech matte for my phones and iPads as well. Super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Much better deal than the official Nintendo brand
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this to replace the Nintendo brand screen protector since the corners were no longer sticky and starting to peel off. You get a much better deal with this product that you do with the Nintendo brand. This comes with 2 screen protectors instead of 1 and is tempered glass vs. Nintendo's flimsy plastic. Very easy to install, no bubbles for me, and looks very clean on the Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Fat BoyTop Contributor: Mountain Biking

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Went on easily and quickly. I watched the video in the product description before purchase and it was installed just as in the video. Written instructions included were accurate. Came with all needed supplies. My only comment is the top sheet with the tabs to hold it while installing started to separate from the screen saver before I got it positioned correctly. I did have to remove once and reposition but it did not cause any issues to the final install. And my son is very happy that the old bubbled up/ scratched up screen saver has been replaced by this nice smooth new one.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia J

customer_reviews.title: A little confusing to install
customer_reviews.text: The included instructions contradicted themselves - they said to use the little stickers to clean dust particles off the Switch screen - but then the stickers themselves said DON'T use on the Switch screen. I looked for fuller instructions on the website but found none. That being said - the product itself is fine - I skipped the stickering and it turned out OK still. (there's one or two little specks of dust in there - but you can't really see them unless you go looking for them). Things still look sharp and the screen is safely protected so far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Schmapdi

customer_reviews.title: A necessity!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Nintendo switch and regularly use the dock, you NEED one of these. I’ve had my Nintendo switch now for about 2 weeks. Within that first week, I encountered an infuriating (albeit very small) scratch on my screen. Being a sane switch owner, I immediately ordered a screen protector. This particular screen protector comes with more goodies than the official Nintendo switch one (almost all switch screen protectors come with two (2) screen protectors) It also appears to have a higher quality than the official Nintendo as well. Please remember to clean before applying so you don’t have dust or lint stuck between the screen and the screen protector!
customer_reviews.author: Buris

customer_reviews.title: Good screen protector for Nintendo Switch
customer_reviews.text: First of all - quick tip on how to more easily align the screen protector before removing the film that would expose the sticky side of the screen protector. Use some regular tape to hold the screen protector in place before removing anything. Make sure it is aligned correctly to the Switch screen first before installing. On to the actual review: everything was included and looks like it should protect the Switch screen. We are generally pretty careful so unless something happens won't know how well it protects the screen. The installation was relatively easy. No issues with this product. We have used various other screen protectors from this company for other devices and no issues so far
customer_reviews.author: Murphy888

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down Best Screen Protector for Switch
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase as I just bought a new switch. Hands down these are the best and nothing compares. I bought a new leaf case for my Switch that came with a screen protector and it attracted so much dust I crumpled it and threw it in the trash. These are super easy to install. It comes with wet & dry wipes that do an excellent job of cleaning the screen and removing dust. The screen protector goes on easy without air bubbles (well you just push them to the sides if you get any before pressing the screen protector all the way down).
customer_reviews.author: Mista2x

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exact screen protector years ago for my first Nintendo switch console and it is still in perfect condition so I bought it again for my second Nintendo switch I just bought that is the animal crossing new horizons special edition so I wanted to make sure I got a amazing product. It is definitely by far one of the best screen protectors I have ever bought and I have bought a lot of different ones
customer_reviews.author: Irish

customer_reviews.title: Good Product with the Easiest Installation
customer_reviews.text: The first glass screen protectors I tried came from my Orzly Nintendo Switch accessories pack. These are DEFINITELY an upgrade from those if for the simple reason that installation was so much easier. I was impressed with the package's contents and how easy it was to clean and align the protector to my switch (that's usually my biggest aggravation). The protector is crystal clear as advertised and seems high quality, and I will update this review if I have any issues with it. My only thoughts are the card they give you to scrape out the bubbles is bendable cardboard so I ended up giving up and using a plastic gift card instead.
customer_reviews.author: Alaniers

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful screen protector! Do use caution!
customer_reviews.text: I read some other reviews before buying the screen protector and so I decided to use my own supplies to get the screen protector on. I used **VERY CAREFULLY** glasses cleaner to wipe away the fingerprints and I used regular scotch tape to get the dust off instead of using their "sticker" thingy. The screen protector went on very easily and has no bubbles or anything underneath. So far it's been great and has really held up! Definitely would be careful though, since others have said negative things about the products to get the screen on your switch..
customer_reviews.author: Asg

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a Nintendo switch and was looking up YouTube videos about recommended accessories when I came across one by Gameranx who recommended the amFilm tempered glass screen protector for the utility as well as cheap price. I heard the dock for the switch can sometimes scratch the switch itself so while I wait for my dock sock to come from Etsy I also wanted my switch screen protected. It comes with 2 screen protectors which is great because my butter fingers usually mess up the first time and end up with bubbles or debris showing (I nailed it this time, though). Overall I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K.GoGorilla

customer_reviews.title: Air Bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Even after thoroughly cleaning the screen and following the application instructions exactly there are air bubbles that will not smooth out. End result is I wasted both provided screen covers trying to install them without bubbles, and had zero success. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Make sure you watch the instructional video!
customer_reviews.text: I am by no means good at installing these things so I messed up on the first application! It comes with an instructional video that explains how to apply the tempered glass screen bubble free, but I didn't watch it the first time around so I messed up . Had to chunk that screen protector. With the second screen protector I watched it (the video) and was able to install it bubble free the second time! The video was extremely helpful! Whats included: It comes with - x2 tempered glass screens - x2 screen cleaning wipes - x2 screen drying wipes - x1 bubble smooth card - x1 soft cloth wipe thing - stickers ? I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Lett

customer_reviews.title: 1st time buying this brand and I have no regrets
customer_reviews.text: For such a low price I am pleasantly surprised by the quality feel of the screen protector. The glass is durable and feels like it will protect my screen while using. It also does not smudge or keep finger prints as much as I though it would. It is also easy to wipe off and clean. Added bonus for the price is that It comes with two which has allowed me to have one in storage in case the first one breaks. Take your time installing. There is not alignment tray included so it's easy to be even the tiniest bit off on the installation.
customer_reviews.author: AverageGradStudent

customer_reviews.title: Bad Adhesive Causes Bubbles on Corners
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to work well, since i followed all instructions. However, after 24 hours, the corners and edges of the Screen Protector had begun to get bubbles. These bubbles looked like small cracks forming at the edges and corners and begun to spread towards the center. Then I used the second screen protector in the exact same way and it looked perfect for a day. Send the next day when I got home and checked it the same bubbles have formed around the edges again. I believe the adhesive wears off around the edges. So in my case I got a defective product
customer_reviews.author: Ekimsnilloc

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation and Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great screen protector kit that includes every little extra detail you'll need to make the installation simple. It included both wet and dry cleaning wipes, a cleaning cloth, and a tool for removing air bubbles. The cleaning accessories did an excellent job prepping the screen. Overall the installation was easy and not frustrating at all. Since it's tempered glass air bubbles really aren't a problem at all. Once you set start to push the screen protector onto the surface of the switch it starts to install itself and you can watch it push all the air out on it's own. I would buy this again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit and Look
customer_reviews.text: What I liked about this screen protector was that it was easy to install. In my picture I do have tiny hairs and teeny tiny specs left on the screen but it fits perfectly and keeps the clarity of the original screen on there. I have full confidence this screen protector will protect the switch until it either breaks due to internal functions or I sell the console to someone else. Love the product the only problem I have is it's very easy to get fingerprints on the screen but in turn is very easy to clean them off. Good thing its not a touch screen hand held or else this would be rather annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: One arrived with dust from the factory
customer_reviews.text: In this 2-pack, one of the protectors arrived with 2 specks of dust between the glass protector and the plastic film behind it. I tried to install it anyways, and the dust left a couple of very large bubbles on the screen. I removed that protector and tried to install the second protector, but I didn't line it up correctly and the speaker holes interfered with the protector. It's my fault for going too quickly, I didn't dock any stars for that. It is still concerning that one arrived unusable though.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend, took way to long to put on
customer_reviews.text: I wish this kit had come with better materials for installation. I struggled a lot getting the screen cover on because it’s a weird shape and the screen constantly held on to dust. I wiped and wiped over and over but I couldn’t get everything off. I’m not sure if it was because the materials were not good or if it’s just a cheap screen cover. I needed to completely clear the screen over 10 times before I got it to a reasonable cleanliness. In the end, I got the screen cover in and it works fine, I just wish that there was better cleaning materials in the packet that made it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely essential
customer_reviews.text: Switch screen docking was designed extremely poorly. For a console that is supposed to be portable and frequently traveled with the screen shouldn't be scratched by the dock designed to hold it. Inserting it in and out or it shaking side to side once inserted will quickly leave the screen with scratches. This product prevents that and protects the incredibly scratch-able screen. It applied for me extremely easily with no air bubbles. Pro-tip: run an extremely hot shower until your bathroom steams up, the steam will take the dust particles out of the air so as long as you apply the protector over a clean screen you should have a fairly painless experience.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Got IT Right!
customer_reviews.text: This order was perfect. The package contained everything I needed. Especially the two pack. Couldn't be a better deal. The glass fits perfect, perfect clarity, and no smudges. It comes with wet and dry wipes, and a card to clear out bubbles. For the price it's amazing!! Oh and if you or someone is having problems with dust. **Advice: Run a hot shower in a closed bathroom until you have a higher humidity. It settles any dust in the air and makes it so after cleaning you don't have to worry about air particles. I screwed up once and then searched for tips. NAIL GUN!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a bit tricker than expected, even with running the shower to reduce dust (as they recommend). The bottom right corner ended up with an air bubble for a bit, even with squeegee-ing out bubbles. BUT, this eventually worked its way out. I'd definitely recommend picking these up. It provides a nice, hard, screen for your Switch instead of the plastic, easily-scratched one that the Switch comes with. Worth it for just one, but for two it's a no brainer. Some people say this doesn't allow their Switch to fit in the dock. Not true. Works great, without rubbing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This protector saved out Switch. Works perfectly. In 2 years no problems with lifting of glass.
customer_reviews.text: I will never doubt the need for a screen protector like this again. We put this on our Switch immediately after getting it new. Fast forward 2 years and my son did something, dropped the switch just right so the screen clipped a desk corner. Totally cracked the protector and I was sure the screen of the Switch itself. But....After peeling the screen protector off, there our Switch was in absolutely perfect condition. No screen problems at all. I am ordering another set of these so we can have a backup protector when or if it gets damaged again.
customer_reviews.author: Lvmycorcor

customer_reviews.title: First set wasn’t the best quality. They sent replacement, customer service is great!
customer_reviews.text: **edited to add** They kindly replaced and corrected the problem I previously had about them being such poor quality. Since the new replacement screen I have had zero issues and it’s still working great. Thanks for correcting the issue! Customer service was great 👌🏻 I literally just got this item yesterday and today it’s already cracked. I didn’t drop it, nothing fell on it and it’s shattered down the middle. My coffee cup literally BARELY tapped it and the entire screen is now shattered! Would not buy again. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: @fivefreespirits

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but instructions was a bit confusing
customer_reviews.text: I always put tempered glass protectors on my devices after having to replace a cracked screen once and usually the instructions are pretty straight forward but this one confused me a bit with there being 2 stickers on the side to help line it up after you remove the sticky side which is "side 1" which I thought was the non sticky side. Usually it wouldn't be an issue on making a mistake with the lint stickers but the ones I got weren't very sticky and didn't do a good job at removing the extra lint sadly :(
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the Nintendo Switch.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a MUST HAVE for the Nintendo Switch. I have used amFilm glass screen protectors on other products. I love how well it works and how easy it is to apply. I receive a great finish every time. The Nintendo Switch has a plastic screen that is relatively easy to scratch. This screen protector is a must have and will make your Nintendo Switch last longer and look better. For best results I recommend you put this screen protector on when the Nintendo Switch is brand new. I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: SlySalimander

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for price, Complete installation very easy
customer_reviews.text: Top line: High quality product for the price, easy to install Good: All the tools and instructions needed to install are provided, along with a second screen if you manage to screw something up with your first try. Cutout matches the Switch screen exactly. Bad: Installation might be challenging if you are less than dexterous or don't like reading instructions completely before starting. Majority will not have any problems. Other: I would have happily paid $9 for a single, good screen protector for my Switch. The fact that I paid $9 and got TWO GREAT protectors makes me happy, even if I'll probably never use the second one.
customer_reviews.author: ZDFTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for switch owners
customer_reviews.text: The switch has a plastic screen that Will get scratches, but it won't crack. This tempered glass screen protector will keep the plastic switch screen scratch free, and if anything happens there is always the second included protector. I advise this be bought alongside a switch because it's much less expensive to replace the protector than the soft screen of the switch. The product is more like a comprehensive installation kit for a screen protector. Includes multiple types of cleaning wipes as well as a micro fiber cloth, and comes with two tempered glass screen protectors. Incredible product that I recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: TZ

customer_reviews.title: This saved my kiddo's switch and multiple worlds!
customer_reviews.text: Nintendo isn't repairing squat right now because pandemic (plus hey why not make people try to DIY or buy new ones) and of course everyone is switch sold out atm and OF COURSE my kiddo tripped and fell super hard (she is a bit bruised up with a few cuts but otherwise ok!) and of course the screen shattered. She was devastated. Only it is fine. The cover shattered and saved the screen. It's perfect. So thank you. I highly, highly, HIGHLY recommend if not insist you try this. I'm back to order a new one.
customer_reviews.author: D Gutterman

customer_reviews.title: Easiest screen saver install EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I usually ask my wife to install screen savers as she does a better job...but it stresses her out because they can be so easy to leave bubbles. So I did this one myself and it was SO EASY! Follow the instructions and it you won't have any problems. There were only a 3-4 air bubbles once I laid it on the screen and they smoothed out easily. As for functionality, will see how long they last or scratch up, but the touch screen is as responsive as it was without the screen saver. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley D

customer_reviews.title: one of 2 functional
customer_reviews.text: I had the hardest time installing the first one due to the amount of bubbles. I initially thought it was me and my uncoordinated hands but after the the first one just didn't stick right. I threw it out and attempted to put on the 2nd one. I used the same method as shown on instructions as first one and the thing sealed itself and pushout all the bubbles. I think the first one was likely defective considering how easily the 2nd one went on. I barely put it down and it sealed, the first one I had to try to push it down and still didn't seal.
customer_reviews.author: Mind's Eye

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit is not the best, application was easy enough however I've put screen protectors on hundreds of phones and tablets and I had a difficult time lining up one side and dropping it down flat to cover all the area evenly. It was annoying having to retype multiple times but good thing it was a 2 pack because I basically wasted all my warm up tries on the first one, then got the 2nd one on in an ok position and just left it. I think it will still do its job well but the quality has me somewhat concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Yearskii

customer_reviews.title: amFilm Protectors are the Real Deal!
customer_reviews.text: So, I figured screen protectors are all the same - one can’t be that much better than another, right? I was wrong. Before installing this version, I installed the one included in my Switch’s “bonus pack.” It was garbage. Not clear, flimsy, couldn’t get it installed without bubbles, even after being meticulous with my attempt. So I broke down and purchased the amFilm version. Wow, what a difference. They’re thick (but not negatively), easy to install, the display looks great with them on, they feel good to your touch, and they install without bubbles! If you’re not convinced yet (and stubborn like me), go ahead and install another version. Then, when you’re ready for the best, get these.
customer_reviews.author: mtbRoadie

customer_reviews.title: Saddening...
customer_reviews.text: Once this item arrived I quickly applied the screen protecter and was left with 0 bubbles or anything, perfect installation and docked the Nintendo Switch. After two or so hours of playing on docked mode, I undocked it and too my surprise the screen protectors adhesive melted and looked cracked and horrible. I quickly re tried, I applied the second one hoping this time no melting occurs. I even went as far as waiting 24-32 hours for the adhesive to settle in. I docked it and began playing again. Once I undocked it, the adhesive has once again melted and once again was ruined. Very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Rene Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Yes all the way around. It’s better to crack a screen protector than to crack the screen.
customer_reviews.text: Yes. Just yes, get it. It’s a question of intelligence and practicality really. Why spend so much on the console if you’re not going to go the extra mile to take minor precautions. I ordered these before I even bought the game because I wasn’t gonna take the chance. I wouldn’t even take the game out of the box until my fiancé put this in it. I saw all the iPhone X incidents unfold. Not I says the guy who was smart and bought a screen protector. I make stupid decisions in life, but buying expensive devises and then NOT protecting said devices is not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Static cling not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: The directions state to hold the tabs of the front film to align the protector correctly. I found that the cling of this film was not strong enough and started to pull away while trying to apply the protector. This resulted in the screen protector being misaligned and i had to remove it. To remove it I had to get under one corner and now that corner does not stick. Its not a huge deal but in the future I would not advise using these tabs. You're better off holding the edges while lining it up.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Biniecki

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, does its job
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my new Switch, to protect screen when using as handheld. Packaging and equipment are all top notch and its pretty straight forward to lineup and install. Had to raise and reapply several times to get the bubbles out completely though, and it caused the very corner of one side to not be as sticky but its hardly noticeable. I will say they work great with the touchscreen still being responsive, and considering I dropped it on our hardwood with no damage or injury to the unit, they work as advertised. Glad I got it before that happened. Recommend to anyone considering.
customer_reviews.author: David Trull

customer_reviews.title: 2 years in, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: After having this product for two years, I highly recommend it. My first screen protector cracked and I had forgotten that I saved the backup second one that comes in this box. Today after two years, I replaced the cracked protector with the backup and had such an easy experience I had to come leave a 5-star review. This kit comes with every useful tool you'll need to have a perfect, clean, aligned, and dust free installation. If I ever need any screen protectors, I'll surely be shopping from this brand and company.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Talon

customer_reviews.title: Good product would buy again
customer_reviews.text: 5 star review so far. I used the supplied stickers for the placement of the screen protector (alignment). Placed protector down secured on one side with stickers after cleaning the screen with both the wet and then dry wipes. Peeled back the plastic liner placed onto the screen and gently pressed all bubbles out as needed( not a lot, bubbles basically went away by themselves). Removed stickers then pulled back final layer of full off protector. Clear, responsive and so far durable. Will update if needed...
customer_reviews.author: Concerned consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to apply. I wish I had bought these first. Our Switch came with a thinner protector so I applied that about a year ago. I could never get it smooth and it showed marks on the surface (like grease and whatnot). This one applied beautifully the first try and looks amazing. The only thing I don't understand with any of these protector kits is why they come with multiple sets. Do that many people buy more than one Switch or are people saving them to replace in a few years?
customer_reviews.author: Jeck

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: So I've had zero issues using this on my Switch. I recently purchased this and applied it to my switch, then we went on a 7hr car ride the following day. Kids used it for maybe 5 solid hours (5 straight hours of playing) playing Animal Crossing. Then we used it at our destination for a few hours at a time each day. Now that we are back home the Switch has had hours and hours of straight use in the dock. The screen is still attached with no bubbles or coming loose like others have stated.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W

customer_reviews.title: Crack-free Switch
customer_reviews.text: These are so good, I just used my second protector in the pack so I bought a backup set again. The first protector held up really nicely, but then I noticed a hairline crack after a year or two... and when I took off the protector, my Switch was perfectly fine! I also really like how it's super easy to clean and barely leaves any fingerprints or stains. I have another friend with a Switch who stubbornly refuses to put on a screen protector, and his screen is DIRTY. He plays Switch games even less than me, and the fingerprint grease is almost permanently embedded on his screen. That has never been me.
customer_reviews.author: Gie

customer_reviews.title: 2 pack because you'll mess up placing first one.
customer_reviews.text: Whoever stated that you get two in a package because you'll mess the first one up, was 100% correct. Following intructional video, I tried to align and place the protective glass on from left to right, it didn't line up on other side and was unable to reset glass. On 2nd attempt with second protector, I aligned on top and went downward... Slowly, no bubbles perfectly aligned... Tried to write company via warranty claim link they send in an email, and I got no response. I would really like a back protector send I had to toss out misaligned one because upon peeling off it shattered. Quality seems great.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection, mostly easy to install, FANTASTIC warranty & customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The glass itself feels better than the switch screen itself, the glass seems to be fairly scratch resistant. It comes with everything you need to install (save maybe an air duster). My only complaint would be the dust stickers say "do not use with nintendo switch", and I wish they included something we could use. The installation is somewhat difficult, but with any solid glass protector of such a large size, it's going to be difficult to align properly. Even though I screwed up the initial install, the company sent a replacement, at no charge to myself. Excellent & quick warranty replacement! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner McArdle

customer_reviews.title: Mine broke - after months of hard use and multiple drops, saving the Switch
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble applying the screen protector, but, no worries, another was in the box (and the company appears to have a policy that if you mess that one up, too, they'll send you more). The second try worked perfectly. Eventually, my kids managed to break it by dropping the Switch multiple times, which almost certainly means that the amFilm took the impact instead of the Switch's own display (which was not damaged). So that was $10 well spent! I bought another set. This time, I nailed the application on the first try, which means I have a backup if the kids can't treat the Switch better.
customer_reviews.author: Avi Greengart

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Glass Screen Protectors!
customer_reviews.text: This has become my go-to brand for screen protectors. I have them on everything from iPhone 6s, iPhone 7, iPhone XR, and iPhone 11 Pro Max, to my Nintendo Switches. I usually keep a few extras around because my Teens and their friends will break the screen protector in a heartbeat. And these are easy to install and usually last very well. Because there is more than one in the box, it is a no brainer to replace a screen protector when one gets a chip or breaks. Great accident protection!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Compton

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put on once you learn this trick...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these once I notice very tiny scratches on my Switch's screen. Once they arrived I read the reviews on putting them on. One reviewer recommended doing it after a shower in the bathroom. THIS WORKS. I just turned the shower all the way to hot to steam up the bathroom. Then I started to clean the screen for 10 minutes. Triple checking there were none of the tiny fibers that ALWAYS end up under a screen protector. After it was perfect I used the little tabs and it just popped on perfectly. Smoothed it out and it has been stuck on perfectly since. No lifted corners or bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Willis

customer_reviews.title: I regret not buying it as soon as I bought my switch.
customer_reviews.text: I keep forgetting I even have this on. Bought it over 6 months ago and I regret not buying it as soon as I bought my switch. Does well with vinyl wraps too. I have the wrap over the screen protector. Installation: Easy Bubbles: None to where I forget that it's even on Protection: Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Meilyn

customer_reviews.title: Good but register it on website insert jic
customer_reviews.text: I will say I, ME royally messed up the installation for the first 2 and good thing I registered it on the site because they sent me a replacement 2 for free! These I was more careful with and managed to get a perfect alignment on the first go. Bubbles weren't a problem. If you're like me and picky about your placement, messing up and resticking it messes up the corners so they don't lay smooth. That for me is why I ran through the two because of my errors. If you focus and have a steady hand you can get good alignment the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Stesha

customer_reviews.title: THIS SCREEN PROTECTOR WAS A HERO!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 5 minutes after the shock of finding the Switch screen smashed, as i examined it i remembered i had placed this glass screen protector! Did it work?? grabbed a knife and VOILA!!! It sure did!!! Realized im the one that caused the crack, not my kid. I force zipped the switch case it was in. turns out the controller was case too. it pressed against the screen. Even better, its a 2 pack, so i have back up. Gonna order again for additional back up! Note to self, DONT FORCE ZIP AND CHECK TO SEE WHY IT WONT CLOSE IN THE 1ST PLACE! controller does not go into Switch protective carrying case!!!
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled E-buyer

customer_reviews.title: Screen protector
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector seems great so far. I messed the first one up by my own fault of placing it wrong and having to pull it back up that 1 corner doesnt stick down. The 2nd one went on so smoothly I literally sat it on the switch and it sealed itself down with no bubbles at all. You can't tell it's even on there and it fits the screen perfectly. A nice glass screen protector and it seems like it will hold up to the job. I didnt use any of the wipes that came with it though. I cleaned the screen before hand myself with glass cleaner and then just stuck it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to install, does not impact stand or touch screen
customer_reviews.text: These screen protectors seem to be of high quality - I have only had them installed a week, so I don't know how well they actually protects. They come with some nice tools for installation, like all screen protectors it can be a little tricky, but the manufacturer has done their best to make it easy. I have two Switches, and number 2 was easier than the first, you just need to get the hang of it. The trick is to start in the middle as the guide says, and then move decisively! The touch screen works perfect with the protector, it is hardly noticeable. The protectors are also thin enough that the stand still works with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Maat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and application
customer_reviews.text: I used the hinge method in a steamy bathroom. So much easier to make it straight the first time. I’ve done quite a few screen applications and this was my most flawless result. I’ve never done the hinge method so that may be why, but still... no bubbles or dust. Edges line up perfectly. No raised edges. I’ll update if it starts to lift.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Overall Improvement to Switch
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this screen protector. It went on easily and looks almost flawless. If it was not for the defect in the screen, I would have rated this 5-stars. It came with two screen protectors; however, I don’t trust that the second would not have the same, if not worst, defect since it likely came from the same lot. I also didn’t want to go through the effort of removing the first screen protector. If you own a switch, you need a screen protector. Nintendo really went cheap and the screen is actually made of plastic. This means anything made of plastic or harder can easily scratch the screen (ie: docking station).
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! And easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have always dreaded putting on screen protectors, the bubbles, the wiping, and everything in between, I could never get it correct and would have to lift several times just to get it perfect. The install for this on the Nintendo Switch took me about 5 minutes tops. It was simple, and easy, and it fit perfectly. My 7 year old also plays with the Switch, but mostly as a hand held, which is why getting a screen protector was a must. This just to happens to come with 2, and a warranty to boot. I would definitely purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: had to lower one star because of the thing that you use to get the air bubbles out, its too flimsy and bends easily when you apply pressure to it - which you have to in order to get the air out, which contradicts its use. i had to resort to use my own credit card to get the air out. as for the protector itself, its very high quality and im very satisfied about it, though i wasnt able to put it without some small pieces of dirt getting stuck between it and the screen despite how careful i was, but thats on me :P
customer_reviews.author: orulp

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear & Easy To Apply
customer_reviews.text: These screen protectors are a MUST. I've used non-glass screen protectors in the past on phones, and those always degrade the image quality on the phone and are hard to apply. This comes with instructions, wipes to clean the screen before applying the protector, and a piece of cardstock to iron out any bubbles that may appear. I applied it kind of wrong so I had to peel it back and put it back, so a tiny piece of the corner isn't fully attached to the screen but that 100% user error and not a problem with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Boscowashisnamo

customer_reviews.title: Great protectors for the money
customer_reviews.text: I only needed to use one for my own switch and gave the extra to my girlfriend when I bought another switch. I'm glad I got the screen protectors they work well and you could hardly notice that they are there. Application is tricky, just take your time and try to have patience when applying.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protection
customer_reviews.text: Having faithfully used another name brand (which costs much more) on all my family's phones and watches for years, I was hesitant to purchase this protector due to the low price point.... until I read the reviews. I was pleasantly surprised - shocked even - at the ease of installation and the quality of this product! Just as good as the "big boys" and immediately installed with no bubbles whatsoever. Do yourself a favor and buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Okay once you get it on correctly
customer_reviews.text: So the screen was easy and not easy to install, the first one i followed directions and held the tabs on the sides to put on the screen, but it fall off the protector and lab on the switch anywhere it wanted. The second one was easier once i figured out how to hold it. Also fingerprints, the protector smudges and leaves finger prints worse than the other one i had. But the screen responds time is good, its not too thick and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good product/Company
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 packs of these. The crack easily, but the packaging and company are both pretty solid. Each screen comes with enough supplies for two applications. This also comes with a warranty, which I have not used. On the 4 packs I have bought a few of the screens had trouble sticking down near the ends. It is very hard to get bubbles out, but they work out eventually. You can make a warranty claim if it breaks, but they are at such a good price point that its just easier for me to order new ones. Overall, pretty good product and I recommend it forward.
customer_reviews.author: XV123

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: First off this is my favorite brand screen protector for all my devices. This fits the Switch well and the coating feels nice. My only complaint is there is no installation tray included. It's not the end of the world but it dose make the install much easier and makes for less chances of messing up the install. The good news is amFilm takes care of their customers very quickly if you have any problems. Thanks again for a excellent screen protector at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: The Best Screen Protector For The Switch
customer_reviews.text: This is single handily the best screen protector you will find out there for your Switch. It comes with 2 screens so if you own multiple Switches or need to replace one you got an extra. There's a Switch lite version too that comes with 3. These guys made a great quality product and is priced so well it shocked me at how the quality of the screen protector really is. Great price, great protection, hardly noticeable on the Switch, very durable, and comes with an extra in case of something happens. Well recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Support a small company with a superior product!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for 2 protectors! The installation takes some effort but they have improved the guide cover as it stays on better while you position it over the screen itself. Once correctly installed it really makes the switch looks more high end and is fairly durable (provided your 9 year old doesn't try to peel it off). Oh well, that's another reason why it's a good thing that this comes with two protectors. Well worth the price and a smaller company means better customer service. One was defective and they sent a new set, all I had to do was show visual proof by sending them a photo.
customer_reviews.author: Denita

customer_reviews.title: Not unique or special, but it definitely works
customer_reviews.text: I felt this screen protector specifically deserved a positive review less because of the screen protector itself, but rather the packaging and included installation accessories. I've bought dozens of screen protector "2-Packs" in the past, and so far this is the only one that actually comes with the accessories needed to cleanly install the second protector. 99% of the 2-packs out there only come with one set of installation accessories, but this one comes with two-- one for each protector. I imagine this is the same case with all of their other products, not just the Nintendo Switch screen protector, so that's a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Braccini

customer_reviews.title: The tempered glass absorbs impacts
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive way to protect your Switch screen, and a real bargain since it's a 2-pack. Applied the first in September and, 11 months later in August my son dropped his Switch on the hardwood floor. By all appearances, we both worried that the Switch was shattered. Nope! It was good as new. This kit is a 2-pack with two screens, plus two sets of towelettes. Cleaning & application are both simple, fast & the results are proven.
customer_reviews.author: J.911

customer_reviews.title: Protect your Switch against the Dock
customer_reviews.text: this item is great, the installation process is simple enough and the results are amazing, i have installed this product in 3 different Nintendo Switch (this is my second purchase) and the installation results are Crystal Clear, you really don't notice it unless you look closely at the screen edges and even then, it is very good at repealing fingerprints and it protects against the System Dock scratch problem. love it and definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Screen Cover
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, exactly as described. Fits perfectly and managed to apply it without bubbles. There are "hinge stickers" to use which I highly recommend: without peeling anything, lay the glass where you eventually want it on the switch; without moving the glass, carefully apply two hinge stickers to the top of the glass with half sticking to the switch (this creates the hinge); now lift the glass and clean your screen; remove the "1" cover peel; carefully swing the glass back down onto the switch; use the provided cardboard piece to smooth out the glass. My box's instructions did not include any hinge sticker use or advice so I thought I'd pass along my method!
customer_reviews.author: Moff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good! Easy installation and great price! I always buy Glass for every electronic I own. I bought this when the switch came out 2 years ago and the screen has been amazing at protecting my acreen. I recently got a random crack (may have dropped my Switch when I was asleep) and I wanted to replace it. Super fast and simple, great customer service as well. Always recommend Glass to anyone.... Sorry if this review sounds super bland and fake..... I would love to be paid for this haha. Recommend to anyone with electronics (which is everyone )
customer_reviews.author: Ttimer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use the wipes/stickers on your switch! Otherwise decent screen protector!
customer_reviews.text: The included dust removal stickers say “NOT FOR USE ON SWITCH”, after reading reviews I did NOT use any of the included wipes or stickers out of fear they’d damage my switch. That’s really shady that they include cleaning accessories that aren’t to be used on the product they’re made to protect. Aside from the questionable wipes and stickers, the screen has handy tabs to help you align it and I had no bubbles and you can barely tell there’s a protector! It’s scratch resistant and fingerprints barely show! I like the tempered glass just be wary of the other wipes and stickers included
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: The best screen protector on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This Glass protector is awesome! The price is cheap and looks very good after the install. Installation and instructions was straight forward and it comes with the necessary cleaning wipes, stickers to lift dust, squeegee and microfiber cloth for a smooth install. It comes with two glass screens and took me less than 3 minutes installing 2 screen protectors. I had some air bubble pockets while installing but I just lifted the glass from the corner where its closer to the bubbles and they disappeared quickly with no problems. The glass also reacts very well to touch and is a must to protect the screen of your nintendo switch. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lana G.

customer_reviews.title: Switch almost gave me a twitch
customer_reviews.text: Nearly sh*t myself the other day when my Switch fell off the kitchen counter top and landed on the screen side. I thought it was all over..... I lifted my switch and screen was cracked but the game was running fine. Suddenly I remembered I placed a temped glass on my switch when I bought it 2+ years ago. I pulled it off and my screen was fine, no damage at all from the hard fall, it was the temp glass that shattered. I bought this over 2 years ago and it was WELL WORTH IT! Saved my switch.
customer_reviews.author: a2cool

product_meta.title: amFilm Tempered Glass Screen Protector for Nintendo Switch 2017 (2-Pack)
feature_bullets: Ultra-clear High Definition with 99.9% transparency to allow an optimal, natural viewing experience
Ultra thin-0.3mm thickness is reliable and resilient, and promises full compatibility with touchscreen sensitivity
